00023 ContactAddedCallback            gContactAddedCallback=0;

00027 btScalar        btManifoldResult::calculateCombinedRollingFriction(const btCollisionObject* body0,const btCollisionObject* body1)
00028 {
00029         btScalar friction = body0->getRollingFriction() * body1->getFriction() + body1->getRollingFriction() * body0->getFriction();
00030 
00031         const btScalar MAX_FRICTION  = btScalar(10.);
00032         if (friction < -MAX_FRICTION)
00033                 friction = -MAX_FRICTION;
00034         if (friction > MAX_FRICTION)
00035                 friction = MAX_FRICTION;
00036         return friction;
00037 
00038 }
00039 
00040 btScalar        btManifoldResult::calculateCombinedSpinningFriction(const btCollisionObject* body0,const btCollisionObject* body1)
00041 {
00042     btScalar friction = body0->getSpinningFriction() * body1->getFriction() + body1->getSpinningFriction() * body0->getFriction();
00043     
00044     const btScalar MAX_FRICTION  = btScalar(10.);
00045     if (friction < -MAX_FRICTION)
00046         friction = -MAX_FRICTION;
00047     if (friction > MAX_FRICTION)
00048         friction = MAX_FRICTION;
00049     return friction;
00050 }
00051 
00053 btScalar        btManifoldResult::calculateCombinedFriction(const btCollisionObject* body0,const btCollisionObject* body1)
00054 {
00055         btScalar friction = body0->getFriction() * body1->getFriction();
00056 
00057         const btScalar MAX_FRICTION  = btScalar(10.);
00058         if (friction < -MAX_FRICTION)
00059                 friction = -MAX_FRICTION;
00060         if (friction > MAX_FRICTION)
00061                 friction = MAX_FRICTION;
00062         return friction;
00063 
00064 }
00065 
00066 btScalar        btManifoldResult::calculateCombinedRestitution(const btCollisionObject* body0,const btCollisionObject* body1)
00067 {
00068         return body0->getRestitution() * body1->getRestitution();
00069 }
00070 
00071 btScalar        btManifoldResult::calculateCombinedContactDamping(const btCollisionObject* body0,const btCollisionObject* body1)
00072 {
00073     return body0->getContactDamping() + body1->getContactDamping();
00074 }
00075 
00076 btScalar        btManifoldResult::calculateCombinedContactStiffness(const btCollisionObject* body0,const btCollisionObject* body1)
00077 {
00078     
00079     btScalar s0 = body0->getContactStiffness();
00080     btScalar s1 = body1->getContactStiffness();
00081     
00082     btScalar tmp0 = btScalar(1)/s0;
00083     btScalar tmp1 = btScalar(1)/s1;
00084     btScalar combinedStiffness = btScalar(1) / (tmp0+tmp1);
00085     return combinedStiffness;
00086 }

00089 btManifoldResult::btManifoldResult(const btCollisionObjectWrapper* body0Wrap,const btCollisionObjectWrapper* body1Wrap)
00090                 :m_manifoldPtr(0),
00091                 m_body0Wrap(body0Wrap),
00092                 m_body1Wrap(body1Wrap)
00093 #ifdef DEBUG_PART_INDEX
00094                 ,m_partId0(-1),
00095         m_partId1(-1),
00096         m_index0(-1),
00097         m_index1(-1)
00098 #endif //DEBUG_PART_INDEX
00099         , m_closestPointDistanceThreshold(0)
00100 {
00101 }

00104 void btManifoldResult::addContactPoint(const btVector3& normalOnBInWorld,const btVector3& pointInWorld,btScalar depth)
00105 {
00106         btAssert(m_manifoldPtr);
00107         //order in manifold needs to match
00108 
00109         if (depth > m_manifoldPtr->getContactBreakingThreshold())
00110 //      if (depth > m_manifoldPtr->getContactProcessingThreshold())
00111                 return;
00112 
00113         bool isSwapped = m_manifoldPtr->getBody0() != m_body0Wrap->getCollisionObject();
00114         bool isNewCollision = m_manifoldPtr->getNumContacts() == 0;
00115 
00116         btVector3 pointA = pointInWorld + normalOnBInWorld * depth;
00117 
00118         btVector3 localA;
00119         btVector3 localB;
00120         
00121         if (isSwapped)
00122         {
00123                 localA = m_body1Wrap->getCollisionObject()->getWorldTransform().invXform(pointA );
00124                 localB = m_body0Wrap->getCollisionObject()->getWorldTransform().invXform(pointInWorld);
00125         } else
00126         {
00127                 localA = m_body0Wrap->getCollisionObject()->getWorldTransform().invXform(pointA );
00128                 localB = m_body1Wrap->getCollisionObject()->getWorldTransform().invXform(pointInWorld);
00129         }
00130 
00131         btManifoldPoint newPt(localA,localB,normalOnBInWorld,depth);
00132         newPt.m_positionWorldOnA = pointA;
00133         newPt.m_positionWorldOnB = pointInWorld;
00134         
00135         int insertIndex = m_manifoldPtr->getCacheEntry(newPt);
00136 
00137         newPt.m_combinedFriction = calculateCombinedFriction(m_body0Wrap->getCollisionObject(),m_body1Wrap->getCollisionObject());
00138         newPt.m_combinedRestitution = calculateCombinedRestitution(m_body0Wrap->getCollisionObject(),m_body1Wrap->getCollisionObject());
00139         newPt.m_combinedRollingFriction = calculateCombinedRollingFriction(m_body0Wrap->getCollisionObject(),m_body1Wrap->getCollisionObject());
00140     newPt.m_combinedSpinningFriction = calculateCombinedSpinningFriction(m_body0Wrap->getCollisionObject(),m_body1Wrap->getCollisionObject());
00141         
00142         if (    (m_body0Wrap->getCollisionObject()->getCollisionFlags()& btCollisionObject::CF_HAS_CONTACT_STIFFNESS_DAMPING) ||
00143             (m_body1Wrap->getCollisionObject()->getCollisionFlags()& btCollisionObject::CF_HAS_CONTACT_STIFFNESS_DAMPING))
00144     {
00145         newPt.m_combinedContactDamping1 = calculateCombinedContactDamping(m_body0Wrap->getCollisionObject(),m_body1Wrap->getCollisionObject());
00146         newPt.m_combinedContactStiffness1 = calculateCombinedContactStiffness(m_body0Wrap->getCollisionObject(),m_body1Wrap->getCollisionObject());
00147         newPt.m_contactPointFlags |= BT_CONTACT_FLAG_CONTACT_STIFFNESS_DAMPING;
00148     }
00149 
00150         if (    (m_body0Wrap->getCollisionObject()->getCollisionFlags()& btCollisionObject::CF_HAS_FRICTION_ANCHOR) ||
00151             (m_body1Wrap->getCollisionObject()->getCollisionFlags()& btCollisionObject::CF_HAS_FRICTION_ANCHOR))
00152     {
00153         newPt.m_contactPointFlags |= BT_CONTACT_FLAG_FRICTION_ANCHOR;
00154     }
00155 
00156         btPlaneSpace1(newPt.m_normalWorldOnB,newPt.m_lateralFrictionDir1,newPt.m_lateralFrictionDir2);
00157         
00158 
00159         
00160    //BP mod, store contact triangles.
00161         if (isSwapped)
00162         {
00163                 newPt.m_partId0 = m_partId1;
00164                 newPt.m_partId1 = m_partId0;
00165                 newPt.m_index0  = m_index1;
00166                 newPt.m_index1  = m_index0;
00167         } else
00168         {
00169                 newPt.m_partId0 = m_partId0;
00170                 newPt.m_partId1 = m_partId1;
00171                 newPt.m_index0  = m_index0;
00172                 newPt.m_index1  = m_index1;
00173         }
00174         //printf("depth=%f\n",depth);
00176         if (insertIndex >= 0)
00177         {
00178                 //const btManifoldPoint& oldPoint = m_manifoldPtr->getContactPoint(insertIndex);
00179                 m_manifoldPtr->replaceContactPoint(newPt,insertIndex);
00180         } else
00181         {
00182                 insertIndex = m_manifoldPtr->addManifoldPoint(newPt);
00183         }
00184         
00185         //User can override friction and/or restitution
00186         if (gContactAddedCallback &&
00187                 //and if either of the two bodies requires custom material
00188                  ((m_body0Wrap->getCollisionObject()->getCollisionFlags() & btCollisionObject::CF_CUSTOM_MATERIAL_CALLBACK) ||
00189                    (m_body1Wrap->getCollisionObject()->getCollisionFlags() & btCollisionObject::CF_CUSTOM_MATERIAL_CALLBACK)))
00190         {
00191                 //experimental feature info, for per-triangle material etc.
00192                 const btCollisionObjectWrapper* obj0Wrap = isSwapped? m_body1Wrap : m_body0Wrap;
00193                 const btCollisionObjectWrapper* obj1Wrap = isSwapped? m_body0Wrap : m_body1Wrap;
00194                 (*gContactAddedCallback)(m_manifoldPtr->getContactPoint(insertIndex),obj0Wrap,newPt.m_partId0,newPt.m_index0,obj1Wrap,newPt.m_partId1,newPt.m_index1);
00195         }
00196 
00197         if (gContactStartedCallback && isNewCollision)
00198         {
00199                 gContactStartedCallback(m_manifoldPtr);
00200         }
00201 }
